data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Paranaense's Thiago Heleno goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Paranaense throw-in in Santos's half.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Santos.
In the minute 8, In Curitiba Paranaense drive forward through Leo Cittadini. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 9, Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Arthur Gomes for Santos drives towards goal at Arena da Baixada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Luiz Felipe (Santos) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 16, Paranaense's Maycon Nikao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Santos a goal kick.
Throw-in Paranaense.
In the minute 17, Paranaense to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique waits before resuming play because Christian for Paranaense is still down.
Free kick Paranaense.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Christian is back on his feet again.
Santos needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 22, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Christian, who is grimacing with pain.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Santos.
Christian, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Fabinho is the substitute for Paranaense.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 27, In Curitiba Paranaense attack through Reinaldo. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Santos at Arena da Baixada.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 30, Free kick Paranaense.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
In the minute 33, Santos have a goal kick.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Santos.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 39, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 42, The match at Arena da Baixada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Laercio Solda, who is down injured.
Alex (Santos) has replaced the possibly injured Laercio Solda at Arena da Baixada.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Paranaense a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
The first-half is over at Arena da Baixada.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 47, Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Santos.
In the minute 49, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Curitiba.
In the minute 51, Paranaense's Maycon Nikao is whistled for offside at Arena da Baixada.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Paranaense!
In the minute 54, Paranaense are pushing forward but Erick's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Santos at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Santos at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 55, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 58, Cuca (Santos) is making a second substitution, with Madson replacing Marcos Rogerio Ricci Lopes.
Sandry Roberto is replacing Ivonei for Santos at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 59, Santos's Sandry Roberto gets in a shot on goal at Arena da Baixada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Curitiba, Paranaense push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Paranaense's Maycon Nikao misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Erick of Paranaense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Santos have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Wellington with Jaime Alvarado. This is the second substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
Paulo Autuori is making the team's third substitution at Arena da Baixada with Ravanelli replacing Reinaldo.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Santos throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Paranaense.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Paranaense's Erick is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Santos.
The away team have replaced Marcos Leonardo with Marinho. This is the fourth substitution made today by Cuca.
The away team replace Jobson with Jean Mota.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in Santos.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a Santos throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 71, Can Santos capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Free kick Santos.
Paranaense's Ravanelli gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Santos defender.
In the minute 75, Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Thiago Heleno scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 76, Ravanelli with an assist there.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Erick gets his shot on target but fails to score for Paranaense.
In the minute 80, Santos have a dangerous throw-in.
Santos apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Sandry Roberto but the ball hits the post!
Sandry Roberto (Santos) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 83, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Paranaense's area.
Santos to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 85, In Curitiba, Alex (Santos) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
In the minute 86, Marcelo De Lima Henrique signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Curitiba.
Marcelo De Lima Henrique awards Santos a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Curitiba.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Santos.
The match has come to a close in Curitiba. The final score is 1-0.
Bissoli is replacing Renato Kayzer for the home team.
Paulo Autuori is making the team's fifth substitution at Arena da Baixada with Felipe Aguilar replacing Maycon Nikao.
Marinho (Santos) has received a yellow card from Marcelo De Lima Henrique.
